name: Dungeon: Adventuring Construction System
overview: Published in Loadstar #074 + Loadstar #078 + Loadstar #167 + Loadstar #168 + Loadstar #175 + Loadstar #176. This game allows you to create characters, give them attributes like race, name and assign stats and locations that you create yourself for a fully interactive fantasy setting or just a place to save your favorite character information.
